com.communote.server.core.blog.notes.processors

Class ExtractUsersNotePreProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.notes.processors.ExtractUsersNotePreProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orderable, NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor

    public class ExtractUsersNotePreProcessor
extends Object
implements NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor
    This processors extracts the users to be notified from the content. It also checks, if the note is a direct message and takes this into account.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
